description: This file defines API routes for managing a user's wishlist in a web application, including listing, adding, retrieving, and removing wishlist entries. It utilizes FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, and Pydantic models to implement RESTful endpoints.

classes.name: WishlistAddRequest
classes.description: Pydantic model for the request payload when adding a book to the wishlist.

methods.name: Select _query_user_wishlist_base(user_id: str)
methods.description: Builds a base SQLAlchemy select statement to fetch wishlist entries for a specific user, preloading related book and user data.

methods.name: Paginated[WishlistRead] list_wishlist( page: int = Query(default=1, ge=1, description="Page number (1-based)"), page_size: int = Query(default=20, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Endpoint to list all wishlist entries for the authenticated user with pagination.

methods.name: WishlistRead add_to_wishlist( payload: WishlistAddRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Endpoint to add a specified book to the authenticated user's wishlist, with validation for existence and duplication.

methods.name: WishlistRead get_wishlist_entry( entry_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Retrieve a specific wishlist entry by its ID, ensuring it belongs to the current user.

methods.name: Response remove_from_wishlist( entry_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Delete a wishlist entry by its ID, only if it belongs to the current user.
